Posts.Content: alone in this battle, my daughter told me she hates me and she wish I died of breast cancer my heart was broken all because she did not want to help pay bills. I had to go to court to get her out of my house.this is my third battle with this curse. I am in pretty good health . told my dr please dont send me home to die there is know one there. I am able to take care of myself,my dr gets so nervous when i make that statement. I am on herceptin fadsodex and tykerb belive it or not I have no side efeects from all of it.Please pray for me would love to hear from others at my private email address
Posts.Title: so all

Posts.Content: of anyone that will help me get to md anderson in houston texas texas?i have bc that has came back for a third time my doctor has somewhat brush me off, she is taking a wait and see stance, i cant play with my life like that. I have very small nodules on my lung. i go for a pet scan july 30th. i am not in any distress other than so afraid and i am figthing this struggle all alone. I am on a fix income. i am 62 years youngshe said something about  putting me on a pill she is on vacation rite now.I cry all the time. and i am so depressed. i have food and shelter but need someone to talk to and to help me. i live in maryland
